A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is what happens when someone who hates Star Wars makes a Star Wars movie. The introduction of new characters who add nothing to the story\, side quests that do nothing to advance the story\, revelations specifically designed to remove anything special to the main characters\, and pointless deaths do not \"honor the saga's rich legacy\" or add \"surprising twists\". All I can tell from the critical reviews is that the critics were never Star Wars fans.
